title: MORE Keen 2 help
content:
I honestly can't see how to get to the exit of the Paris level...'cause if you activate the switch 'the earth explodes'. Help! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wormouth.gif[/img] ---
*I'm Kristen, I'm 16 and I'm a Bloogoholic*
[img]http://tinypic.com/feihsg.jpg[/img]
My "favorite enemies" from the Keen games

title: edit
content:
Edit: I'm really confused. Some switches operate bridges, and some make the earth explode. Plus I try to get to the exits [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-pogo.gif[/img] but I get killed on those tv-antenna-thingy-zappy-things...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stunned.gif[/img] ---
*I'm Kristen, I'm 16 and I'm a Bloogoholic*
[img]http://tinypic.com/feihsg.jpg[/img]
My "favorite enemies" from the Keen games

title: Re: edit
content:
The only switches you need worry about are the ones just beside the pictures of the cities you're saving. All other switches are fine to use.--------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: edit
content:
"Plus I try to get to the exits but I get killed on those tv-antenna-thingy-zappy-things..."
Shoot the purple things, they'll destroy the machines and the "tv-antennas" that are blocking your way. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

The purple vorticon thingy or what?? When I shoot the jumping blue and purple thing guarding the machine, I still die on the T.V. antenna things...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img] ---
*I'm Kristen, I'm 16 and I'm a Bloogoholic*

Nevermimd...I shoot the purply light in the dome...---
